content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] What was your initial offer for the rent?
[Answer] My initial offer for the rent was 400 Euro per month.

[Question] What was the final agreed price for the rent?
[Answer] The final agreed price was not reached. The landlord, Mr. Schmidt, agreed to 650 Euro per month, but I could not go above 625 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] On a scale from 1 to 10, how would you rate the likeability of Peter Schmidt?
[Answer] I would rate the likeability of Peter Schmidt as 10. The conversation was polite and respectful, and we were able to have a productive negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Did you feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation?
[Answer] No, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] If I felt discriminated or offended, why did I feel that way?
[Answer] But I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Thank you for your cooperation. Is there anything else you would like to add?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Is there anything else you would like to add?
[Answer] Thank you. I have nothing else to add.
name: Yi-Nuo
